[[inst_hl_lwp]]
==== HL.LWP

*Syntax:* hl.lwp [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lwp.svg[HL.LWP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/PAIR
